name: The Jersey Dogs
description:
The Jersey Dogs

A classic, mini Role Playing Game (RPG).

An undercover cop is ordered to infiltrate the infamous Jersey Dogs - but is their leader, the elusive Mr. X, the terrible man he's been made out to be?

This fun, short RPG was created during my student's English lessons. His name is Hiro, he's 15, and he wrote the game story, developed the characters, and designed the world in which the game is set.

Neither of us artists, we had to source artwork and sounds from the internet. Where possible, we've ensured that these were licensed 'free to use' but, wherever else, they remain copyright of their respective owner(s). This is the result of an educational project and is a not-for-profit venture.

The game was coded in FreeBASIC, a sort of modern-day 'QBasic' if anybody remembers that!

We hope you enjoy playing the game as much as we enjoyed creating it. I'm sure Hiro would appreciate your comments, so feel free to leave any below :)
